size.description: The spacing size, such as '20px' and '2em', the default unit is 'px', and you can set the horizontal and vertical spacing in array form
size.description_zh: 间距大小，如 `20px` `2em`，默认单位为 `px`，支持数组形式来分别设置横向和纵向间距

align.description: Sets the alignment of child elements
align.description_zh: 设置子元素的对齐方式

wrap.description: Whether or not to wrap lines applies only to horizontal arrangement
wrap.description_zh: 是否自动换行，仅适用于水平方向排列

fill.description: Whether to make the space a block-level element, populating the entire parent element
fill.description_zh: 是否让 Space 变为一个块级元素，填充整个父元素
